name: Love Pillow
description: Spruce up any room at home with a little LOVE! Pillows are hand hooked, 100-percent wool. Simple lining of embroidery in black and cream. 16 by 16-inch square size pillow.

name: Mercury Glass Votive and Tray
description: Create a glittering holiday table for Christmas, Hannukah & the New Year! Hobnail style merucry glass votive holder & tray. Measures 2-1/2"H

name: Hometown Framed Print
description: Our framed Hometown sign is the perfect addition to any home. Signs can also be customized, contact The Little Apple for more information. Please note that custom signs can take up to 3 weeks for delivery. Size: 25-5/8" x 7-5/8".

name: Sneaky Mouse Cheese Knife
description: A fun little addition to your party's cheese plate. Stainless Steel. Measures 7.5 in.

name: Philadelphia Wine Tote
description: Be the hippest BYOB-er in your neighborhood! 100% 7 oz natural cotton, approximately 12″ x 6.5″ x 3" with a 18" handle. Made in Brooklyn, NY. Can also be used as a gift bag for a fabulous bottle of wine or a favor for your Philly Wedding!

name: Philadelphia Wine Tote...Double-Wide
description: Be the coolest BYOB-er in your neighborhood! 10 oz. 100% natural cotton. Perfectly fits 2 bottles of wine!

name: Happy Home Book
description: Twenty-One Sewing and Craft Projects to Pretty Up Your Home! Jennifer Paganelli designs one of the most popular fabric lines in the marketplace. In this gorgeous collection, she shows readers how to whip up twenty-one beautiful accessories to transform their space into a sunny, happy home. Each project showcases Jennifer’s fresh, whimsical style—from luxe drapery to cheery tablecloths and napkins.

name: Bike Print Shopper
description: These shoppers are colorful, fashionable & durable! These shoppers are colorful, fashionable & durable! Great gifts for everyone on your list and you don't even have to wrap it! We have four fun styles. Made with 95% post consumer recycled material. 15.75"w x 15.35"h x 5.9"d

name: Vintage Camera Zipper Pouch
description: The perfect pouch to store all your stuff Made from 95% recycled materials! Size: 9.5 x 7.2".

name: Air Mail Zipper Pouch
description: The perfect pouch to store all your stuff Made from 95% recycled materials! Size: 9.5 x 7.2".

name: She Works Hard Coin Purse
description: Store all that pesky change in something cute! A great accompaniment to a gift card! Made from 95% recycled materials and measures 4x3".

name: Coffee Last Drug Coin Purse
description: Store all that pesky change in something cute! A great accompaniment to a gift card! Made from 95% recycled materials and measures 4x3".

name: Canning Jar Pendant Necklace
description: This delicate Yellow Owl Workshop necklace, housed in a glass tube with a cork, holds at its center a canning jar hanging from an 18k gold dipped chain. 22k gold gilded pendant. 18k gold dipped chain. Enamel. Pendant measures 1 inch in diameter. Chain measures 30 inches long. Made in the United States

name: Bike Pendant Necklace
description: This delicate Yellow Owl Workshop necklace, housed in a glass tube with a cork, holds at its center a bike pennant hanging from an 18k gold dipped chain. 22k gold gilded pendant. 18k gold dipped chain. Enamel. Pendant measures 1 inch in diameter. Chain measures 30 inches long. Made in the United States

name: One Good Deed a Day Journal
description: Do something good today! If kindness is indeed contagious, it’s about to go absolutely viral. This uplifting book suggests 365 seemingly simple actions that have the power to ignite a chain reaction of compassion. Each brightly illustrated page features an inspiring prompt (“tell a friend why she means the world to you,” “pay for the car behind you at the toll booth,” “say a blessing for one thing you’re grateful for today”) encouraging people to make meaningful connections with loved ones, build community, spread cheer to strangers, or prioritize their own happiness.

name: Bird's Nest Lidded Bowl
description: Store your baubles or sweets in this pretty lidded bowl. This cute covered bowl mimicks a birds nest. Complete with a bird and her eggs, it is suitable to hold your finest jewelery or even as a sugar bowl. Measures 4.5 inches across. Porcelain.

name: "What Are Little Girls Made Of?" Book
description: A sweet little book for the mom-to-be! Hardcover 5.25" H x 5.25" W 48 pages

name: Capri Blue Volcano Jar Candle
description: A great go-to gift for any occasion. Capri Blue Jar candles are a must have with their beautiful scents and 100+ hour burn time. Volcano:Tropical fruits and sugared citrus

name: Tokyo Milk Lip Balm
description: The sweetest lips await. Sunflower seed oil, Beeswax, Vitamin E, Aloe Vera and Shea Butter. Flavors: Iced Green Tea: Candied lemon, Mountain Green Tea Let Them Eat Cake: French Vanilla, Shredded Coconut, Cocoa Cherry Bomb: Crushed Bing Cherries and sweet spun Sugar Candied Violet: Violette leaves, crushed Nectarines and Honeycrisp Apples Honey Blossom:weet Clover Honey and decadent Poppy Nectar Sweet Cream: Vanilla Bean, Spun Sugar Opera Mint: Peppermint, Tahitian Vanilla and rich Peruvian Cocoa Rosewater: Sugared rose petals dance with fresh Apple Blossoms

description: Have your cake and smell like it, too! A touch of decadence: Sugar Cane, Coconut Milk, Vanilla Orchid & White Musk. 1 oz.

name: Tokyo Milk Hand Cream
Baby's Head Smell Lavatory Mist
description: Clear the air with this hilariously lovely lavatory mist! For the treatment and cure of soiled air. Apply two quick mists, and all that's left behind is the pleasing and pure scent of a baby's head. 5.3 fl. oz./156 ml

name: Fannie Rosebottom Lavatory Mist
description: Clear the air with this hilariously lovely lavatory mist! You may find you've never suffered any of the issues mentioned here, but rest assured, not everyone is blessed with rose-scented bowel movements. Natural Lavender Bouquet scent. 5.3 fl. oz./156 ml

name: Medical Marijuana Box
description: Perfect container for you best stuff. Measures 7 1/4" l x 5 1/2" d x 3 1/2" h.

name: Whiskey Stones
description: Chill whisky and spirits without diluting! Set of 9 stones and storage pouch. Made from natural soapstone. Freeze for 4-hour before using.

description: For the brewski lover in your life. Black cast iron. Measures 9.5 inches.

name: To Hell With Work Flask
description: A great gift for the hardest worker in your life! Made of Stainless Steel. Holds 3 oz.

name: Bicycle Pint Glasses
description: Looking for a beverage after a long bike ride? This is the perfect glass for the job! Looking for a beverage after a long bike ride? This is the perfect glass for the job! The Handprinted imagery on high-quality glass pints are top rack dishwasher safe!

name: Bicycle Rocks Glasses
description: Sip your favorite cocktail in these Bicycle Rocks Glasses. Sip your favorite cocktail in these Bicycle Rocks Glasses. The Handprinted imagery on high-quality glass pints are top rack dishwasher safe!

name: Bicycle Mug
description: For the Bike enthusiasts morning jolt! Design wraps around the mug 3 3/4" tall, 3" diameter, dishwasher & microwave safe Mug comes in a sturdy graphic gift box!

name: Pep Talks & Picker Uppers Pocket Book
description: Everyone needs a little boost now & then! Everyone needs a little encouragement from time to time. Unfortunately, as our near and dear look to us for reassurance and wisdom, we often find ourselves at a loss for words. Pep Talks & Picker-Uppers for All Occasions provides verbatim lines to spread well-timed cheer and reality checks. Over 560 pep talks and picker-uppers to choose from Hardcover; 3.5 x. 5.75 inches; 112 pages

name: Pick Ups & Come Ons Pocket Book
description: Keep these pocket sized books handy for quick lines for all occasions. Approaching the object of your desire requires more than courage, it takes the right words. Sometimes, however, exercising the organ between your ears is too much work. To assist in your mating efforts, Pickups & Come-Ons for All Occasions provides verbatim lines so you can sweet-talk with class or crass. Hardcover; 3.5 x. 5.75 inches; 112 pages

name: Retro Dishtowels by Anne Taintor
description: Perfect for the lady in your life who does it all with a smile...and some sarcasm! Clean up in style with our 100% cotton kitchen towels - perfect as a "what to bring?!" hostess gift. Towels are 16"W x 28"H.

name: Retro Trays by Anne Taintor
description: A great gfit for your best girlfriends who love to laugh! Versatile 100% Melamine Mini Trays make perfect appetizer plates for pool, patio, or parlor. Put them on a dresser to hold earrings... or on a desk to hold paper clips. The possibilities are endless! Dishwasher safe (not for microwave). Measures 5.5" square

name: I Am: Growth Chart
description: A great Baby Shower gift for any Mom-to-Be! Keep track of the changes through the years, and when your little one is all grown up, fold the book back up into a keepsake you'll cherish for years to come. Dimensions: Closed: 8.5” H x 8.5” W. Open: 42.5” H x 8.5” W

name: Handmade Baby Bibs
description: Let baby eat in style! Unique and stylish baby gifts. All washable...this is where luxury meets easy care. All handmade in the USA. Velcro closure.

name: City of Philadephia Baby Onesie
description: For the urban baby who loves The City of Brotherly Love. 100% organic cottton. Unisex baby one piece outfit. Hand silk screened with water based ink. Not intended for sleep wear. Made in USA.

name: BlaBla Knit Dolls (Small)
description: A great gift for kids of ALL ages! Handmade. 100% Cotton. 12" tall

name: Red Riding Hood Finger Puppets
description: A great gift for kiddos who love to play & pretend! All New Materials. Felt, Printed Cotton and Polyester Filling. Dimension: 2.00"L x 3.00"W

name: Mr. & Mrs. Mug Set
description: The perfect wedding shower gift! two ceramic mugs in a decorative gift box.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Luggage Tag Set
description: Gift these to honeymooners to keep their luggage safe! Luggage tags come in a decorative box, perfect for gift giving!

name: Ceramic Word Mugs
description: Cozy mugs with a postive message. Microwave safe. Dimensions: 4.25 ” x 3.25″ x 3″.

name: To Do Notepad
description: Get organized & stay organized with this efficent little notepad. 6 x 9 inches; 60 sheets

name: Vintage Style Toilet Signs
Cast Iron Bear Bottle Opener
description: This growling bear bottle opener is fierce! Black cast iron. Measures 3.5 inches.

name: WTF Notepad
description: A great gift for co-workers & bosses. 4.5 x 5.5 inches; 150 sheets; paper tape binding with metal posts.

name: A Year of Fortunes Without the Cookies
description: A great gift for friends with uncertain futures! Obviously, the best part of a fortune cookie is what’s inside. Now you can enjoy fortunes all year long—minus the crumbs and calories! A Year of Fortunes (Without the Cookies) contains 365 witty and wise paper prophecies printed on perforated, authentically sized slips—perfect for tearing, sharing, or posting on your fridge. Hardcover, satin cover with gold foil stamping; 4.25 x 3 inches; 152 pages with perforation

name: Field Notes County Fair Pennsylvania Notebook Set of 3
description: I'm writing it down to remember it now. Each memo book each in the colors of 1st, 2nd and 3rd place County Fair ribbons; blue, red and yellow. They’re printed on 100-lb. linen cover stock and all three feature metallic gold printing and 48 pages of graph paper with light blue/grey lines inside. The back covers feature a bevy of meticulously-researched state facts and figures.

name: Homebrew & Drinking Man Pint Glasses
description: Perfect for the Beer drinker in your life. 16 oz (pint) glasses. Pints are priced per single glass. Order two for a set. Glasses made in the USA, printed in Denver, CO. Glasses are (top rack) dishwasher safe, and nice and durable.

name: Whiskey & Bourbon Rocks Glasses
description: For a real man's bar. Glasses made in the USA, printed in Denver, CO. Glasses are (top rack) dishwasher safe, and nice and durable.

name: Good Luck Pigs "Chanchitos"
description: These three-legged Good Luck Pigs are said to bring Love, Health, & Prosperity. In the small village of Pomaire, Chile, it is believed that "chanchitos," little pigs, bring good luck. as a token of goodwill and love. Small pottery pigs are handmade in Chile; sizes range between 1.5" and 1.75" tall.

name: Cast Iron Key Hook
description: Never lose your keys again. Functional & decorative for any home. Made of cast iron & measures 12 inches across.

name: Everyday Boxed Matches...Multiple Styles
description: A great addition to the gift of a candle. The match box comes with about 40 sticks per box & approximately 4.5" tall x 2.5" long x .75" wide.

name: Capri Blue Volcano Diffuser
description: Enjoy the famous Volcano scent all-day, everyday! The cobalt blue glass bottle creates a bold statement while essential oils and natural fragrances create a refreshing ambiance. Volcano: Tropical fruits, sugared oranges, lemons, and limes, entwined with lightly exotic mountain greens. 8 fl oz

name: Aloha Orchid Diffuser
description: Enjoy the famous Aloha Orchis scent all-day, everyday! The cobalt blue glass bottle creates a bold statement while essential oils and natural fragrances create a refreshing ambiance. Aloha Orchid: Freshly picked orchids, jasmine, gardenia, and other white blossoms. 8 fl oz

name: I Am Her
description: A beautifully illustrated & inspirational book. This beautiful book is a collage of quotations, vignettes, & thought provoking questions that will remind all the women in your life of their strengths, spirit & heart.
